name: Post-sql
value:
COPY adp_dwh.cdp_stg_dwh.inpart_for_claims_stg_t
 FROM 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/Inpart/Inpart_claims.csv'
 IAM_ROLE '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE'
 maxerror 5 delimiter '|' csv QUOTE '"' IGNOREHEADER 1 ;
